required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical EvaluatioN of TElmisartan-based Antihypertensive Regimen
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical EvaluatioN of TElmisartan-based Antihypertensive Regimen (CENTER)

brief_summary.textblock: To determine the efficacy and safety of telmisartan-based treatment among patients with metabolic syndrome in actual setting in Philippines.

primary_outcome.measure: Response Rate at the End of 30 Day Period
primary_outcome.description: Response rate of Blood Pressure assessed in the following categories: Sitting SBP < 130 mmHg and/or a reduction of > 20 mmHg from baseline Sitting DBP < 85 mmHg and/or a reduction of > 10 mmHg from baseline Sitting BP normalization < 130 mmHg and DBP < 85 mmHg

primary_outcome.measure: Response Rate at the End of 60 Day Period
primary_outcome.time_frame: At the end of 60 day period
primary_outcome.description: Response rate on Blood Pressure: Sitting SBP < 130 mmHg and/or a reduction of > 20 mmHg from baseline. Sitting DBP < 85 mmHg and/or a reduction of > 10 mmHg from baseline. Sitting BP normalization < 130 mmHg and DBP < 85 mmHg

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Systolic Blood Pressure (SBP) From Baseline
primary_outcome.description: Change in SBP = Value in visit 1(baseline) minus value in visit 3 (at 60-day treatment period)

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Diastolic Blood Pressure (DBP) From Baseline
primary_outcome.description: Change in DBP = Value in visit 1(baseline) minus value in visit 3 (at 60-day treatment period)

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Patients With Presence of Metabolic Risk Factor
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the end of 60 day period
secondary_outcome.description: Presence of metabolic risk factor was identified by the existence of 3 out of the 5 risk factors namely: a.) presence of diabetes mellitus; b) presence of dyslipidemia; c) presence of albuminuria; d) presence of ventricular hypertrophy; and e) presence of co-morbidities, based on patients' Medical History

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age > 45 years
- Increased waist circumference (>88.9cm [>35in] men, >78.7cm [>31in] for women)
- Elevated triglycerides (>150mg/dl)
- Low HDL cholesterol (<40mg/dl in men, <50mg/dl in women)
- Hypertension (>130/>85mmHG)
- Impaired fasting glucose (>110mg/dl) (8)
- Hypertensive patient assessed to benefit from telmisartan based treatment
Exclusion Criteria:
- Hypersensitivity to telmisartan, hydrochlorothiazide (HCTZ) and its excipients
- <3 months myocardial infarction (MI), stroke or severe heart failure

address.city: Cagayan De Oro City, Misamis Oriental

participant_flow.recruitment_details: The protocol specified that the study will consist of 16,000 subjects. However, there are only 15, 268 case report forms (CRFs) submitted

baseline.population: The figure was based on the ITT (intention to treat) population which was reported in the PMS report. The total ITT population is 14, 161.

measure.title: Age
measure.description: Age summarized for 13659 subjects and 502 subjects were missing age information

measure.title: Gender
measure.description: There are 32 subjects with missing gender information

outcome.title: Response Rate at the End of 30 Day Period
outcome.description: Response rate of Blood Pressure assessed in the following categories: Sitting SBP < 130 mmHg and/or a reduction of > 20 mmHg from baseline Sitting DBP < 85 mmHg and/or a reduction of > 10 mmHg from baseline Sitting BP normalization < 130 mmHg and DBP < 85 mmHg
outcome.population: ITT Population: all patients who took at least one dose of the study medication and have at least one point treatment efficacy data available

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: Any publication of the result of this trial must be consistent with the Boehringer Ingelheim publication policy. The rights of the investigator and of the sponsor with regard to publication of the results of this trial are described in the investigator contract.
